mapper.insert: insert into memberinfo(email, password, userName, gender, generation, created_at) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{gender}, #{generation}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from memberinfo where userName = #{userName}
select count(*) from memberinfo where email = #{email}
select userId from memberinfo where userName = #{userName}
select userPass from memberinfo where userName = #{userName} and email = #{email}
